field.name: com_tjucm_dpialite_Instructions
field.label: Instructions
field.freetext:
Provide as much information as you can on this page.
  1. Search to see if we have already evaluated a piece of  software or a supplier and select if you find it in the list. If you only know one or the other, that's fine.
  2. Then please explain what you plan to use it for and the expected benefits.
  3. Lastly, tell us the stage of your implentation and click submit.
  4. The evaluation process will be begin for using this solution in your setting. Please be patient - it may take some time to have information returned by the expertnal organisation.
